synopsis.text:
Despite the sudden loss of his mother and the introduction of twin stepsisters, Ako and Riko, Keita Suminoe is an diligent third-year junior high student focused on his upcoming high school entrance exams. The twins, however, have an unconventional way of displaying their affection towards their younger brother, often engaging in public displays of love that leave Keita both embarrassed and conflicted. As he grapples with his growing romantic feelings for the sisters, Keita's parents encourage him to marry one of them, further complicating his emotional turmoil.

Amidst this whirlwind of emotions, Keita's studies become increasingly challenging as Ako and Riko vie for his attention, often resorting to seductive tactics that threaten to derail his academic aspirations. But the twins aren't the only women vying for Keita's affections, as other girls also begin to show interest in him. With entrance exams looming and temptation around every corner, Keita must navigate the complexities of love, family, and his own desires in order to secure his future and find his true path.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
